Uses of Package
com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics

  • Packages that use com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics 
    Package Description
    com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics  
    com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics.engine  
  • Classes in com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics used by com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics 
    Class and Description
    BufferAttribute
    Class representing one attribute of a buffer layout, such as position, color, texture coordinates etc.
    BufferLayout
    Keeps structural and size-related information concerning the layout of a VertexBufferObject, such as position, color, texture coordinates etc.
    ShaderSource 
    ShaderType 
    VertexBufferObject
    Stores the raw data concerning what is to be drawn by OpenGL, such as vertex positions, colors, texture coordinates etc.
  • Classes in com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics used by com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics.engine 
    Class and Description
    BufferLayout
    Keeps structural and size-related information concerning the layout of a VertexBufferObject, such as position, color, texture coordinates etc.
    ShaderProgram
    Shader program that runs on the GPU.
    VertexArrayObject
    Stores the layout for one or more VertexBufferObject instances.
